Package me.KrazyManJ.KrazyEngine.Any.Text

Enum Class HexColorFormat

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<HexColorFormat>
me.KrazyManJ.KrazyEngine.Any.Text.HexColorFormat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<HexColorFormat>, Constable
public enum HexColorFormat extends Enum<HexColorFormat>
Enumeration of all possible formats of Hex colors. Includes:
  • Regular expression pattern - (getPattern())
  • Encoder for translation - (getDecoder())
  • Decoder for translation - (getDecoder())

    • getDecoder

      public Function<String,@Range(from=6L,to=6L) String[]> getDecoder()
      Gets function of decoding specifing colors. This decoder function decodes string of color only and returns array in size of 6 elements of each hex value [R,R,G,G,B,B].
      Returns:
      decoder function

    • getEncoder

      public Function<@Range(from=6L,to=6L) String[],String> getEncoder()
      Gets function of encoding specifying colors. This encoder function takes data decoded by function getDecoder() and encode it into specified color format
      Returns:
      encoder function

    • nonDefaultValues

      public static HexColorFormat[] nonDefaultValues()
      Gets every color format except FORMATTED one
      Returns:
      All hex colors specified above
